ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A simple and light-weight API for memory profiling of R expressions.  The profiling is built on top of R's built-in memory profiler ('utils::Rprofmem()'), which records every memory allocation done by R (also native code).

A simple and light-weight API for memory profiling of R expressions.  The profiling is built on top of R's built-in memory profiler ('utils::Rprofmem()'), which records every memory allocation done by R (also native code).

name: r-profmem
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.7.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-profmem
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/profmem_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/profmem/profmem_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16efc5f13f4b78919c9d51c07acf62c051e0e3830ae3cc32c596f8daf569c3cb

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('profmem')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('profmem')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/HenrikBengtsson/profmem
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  summary: A simple and light-weight API for memory profiling of R expressions.  The profiling is built on top of R's built-in memory profiler ('utils::Rprofmem()'), which records every memory allocation done by R (also native code).
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-2.1

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: profmem
# Version: 0.5.0
# Title: Simple Memory Profiling for R
# Imports: utils
# Suggests: R.rsp, markdown, microbenchmark
# VignetteBuilder: R.rsp
# Authors@R: c(person("Henrik", "Bengtsson", role=c("aut", "cre", "cph"), email = "henrikb@braju.com"))
# Description: A simple and light-weight API for memory profiling of R expressions.  The profiling is built on top of R's built-in memory profiler ('utils::Rprofmem()'), which records every memory allocation done by R (also native code).
# License: LGPL (>= 2.1)
# LazyLoad: TRUE
# URL: https://github.com/HenrikBengtsson/profmem
# BugReports: https://github.com/HenrikBengtsson/profmem/issues
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
